Package ch.iserver.ace.util

Interface Summary
AsyncExceptionHandler Exception handler for AsyncWorker.
Lock Simple interface for locks.
Semaphore Interface representing a Semaphore.
ThreadDomain ThreadDomain allow to wrap objects so that they are executed on different threads.
 

Class Summary
AopUtil  
AsyncInterceptor AsyncInterceptor is a special method interceptor that adds the intercepted MethodInvocation objects to a BlockingQueue and then returns immediately.
AsyncMethodInvocation MethodInvocation used by the AsyncInterceptor that contains information about the callers stack trace.
AsyncReference Reference class used by the IsolatedThreadDomain to get notified whenever a worker is no longer needed.
AsyncWorker Worker thread that services a queue of MethodInvocation objects.
Base64  
Base64.InputStream A Base64.InputStream will read data from another java.io.InputStream, given in the constructor, and encode/decode to/from Base64 notation on the fly.
Base64.OutputStream A Base64.OutputStream will write data to another java.io.OutputStream, given in the constructor, and encode/decode to/from Base64 notation on the fly.
BoundedThreadDomain BoundedThreadDomain creates only a certain number of worker threads and associated queues.
CallerThreadDomain CallerThreadDomain does not create worker threads at all.
CaretHandler Helper class used to update the position of a caret of a particular user.
CloseableAdvice An interceptor that allows the target object to be closed.
CompareUtil Utility class for comparisons.
CountingSemaphore  
IsolatedThreadDomain
Exception Summary
AsyncExecutionException Execution passed to an AsyncExceptionHandler whenever an async invocation causes failures.
InterruptedRuntimeException
